title: Charge/Discharge ↔ L3/L4 Convergence

convergence.charge_to_L3: Charging karma corresponds to added recursive complexity (L3)
convergence.discharge_to_L4: Discharge corresponds to spontaneous unfolding with minimal interference (L4)

hypotheses: Fixed point emerges when coupling k ≈ 1/phi
Non-interference reduces instability markers and word count
